thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com
thread.title: maxime bourgognon

author: maxime bourgognon
title: maxime bourgognon
text: I received a message from GOLDCAR charging us 120 euros for a missing parcel/back shelf. GOLDCAR had an incomplete record of the sate of the car (due to their informatic system) and accused us of removing/stealing the back shelf of the car. They took the money from our account with no consent and never replied to any of our emails. Customer service from the beginning was HORRIBLE. The funny part? We are not the first ones being charged for a parcel shelf missing...
